text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Tamamo Cross and I continue to train<n>hard for the tryouts.
One day after<n>practice, I ask her if we can talk.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Okay, cooldown's done. So...<n>whaddaya wanna talk about?
choice_data_list: Just a final piece of advice before tryouts.
Just a final piece of advice before tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Final? Whaddaya mean by that?<n>Don't tell me... ya think I
don't got<n>what it takes?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I shake my head in disagreement and<n>explain that she's
got what it takes to<n>win. Which is why this is my final<n>
piece of advice as her temporary<n>trainer.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Wh-what're ya talking about?! Dis<n>isn't the time to be
havin' fun! I<n>needa run for my life!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: What're ya—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Up until now, Tamamo Cross has<n>never been able to race to
her full<n>potential, and I think I know why. I<n>begin to tell her
what I've noticed<n>after observing her...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Huff! Huff! Huff! I gotta win dis! Igotta! I gotta win!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
My folks worked hard to get me into<n>this academy, so I
gotta make it worth<n>the price! That's why I gotta win!<n>
But...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Tamamo Cross's desire to win for<n>her family is a strong
one... Perhaps<n>too strong.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Instead of serving as motivation, it's<n>making her nervous.
Once those<n>nerves get the better of her, she<n>loses sight of
her goal, and her<n>performance suffers.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But that isn't to say her love for her<n>family is a bad thing. If
anything, it<n>should be cherished. So I tell her...
choice_data_list: Introduce the rest of us to White Lightning.
Introduce the rest of us to White Lightning.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If she can combine her love for her<n>family and the joy she
feels from<n>running, Tamamo Cross will have all<n>she needs
to win. At least, that's my<n>theory.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
You've got a point. Dad only called<n>me that when I was
havin' fun, but...<n>shouldn't I be focused on winnin'? Is<n>
that really the time to play 'round?
choice_data_list: Who says you can't do both?
Who says you can't do both?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Haha... Seriously, since when am I so<n>blind? When you say
it like that, it's<n>preeetty obvious, huh?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
It's never been my body holdin' me<n>back—it's my mind.
I've been freakin'<n>myself out 'bout winnin'. No wonder<n>
I'm slowin' down.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: But that's not the real me. Andthat's not White Lightning!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Uraaagh! Whaddaya think of dis?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross's Siblings
text_block_list.text: Cooool!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross's Father
text_block_list.text:
I swear, Tama, I'll never get sick of<n>dat smile on your face
when you're<n>runnin'! Go, White Lightning, the<n>fastest in
Japan!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Thanks for that last tip, and consider it<n>done. Hope you're
lookin' forward to<n>the tryouts! 'Cause, well... I sure will<n>
be!
choice_data_list: That's what I wanted to hear!
That's what I wanted to hear!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Finally, the day of the tryouts arrives.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The racers are approaching the last<n>corner before the final
stretch! The<n>racers in the back are making moves,<n>but is it
too late?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
(The wind whizzin' past my ears, the<n>earth beneath my
feet... the crazy<n>thump-thump in my heart! Gotta say...<n>
been a hot minute since I felt like<n>this!)

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: (Guess I really was in my head, huh?I even forgot how good runnin'feels!)

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
(Now I'm itchin' to let loose! These<n>legs could outrun
anything right now!<n>Better keep your eyes peeled, 'cause<n>
I'ma blow you away!)

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Urrraaaauuugh!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Tamamo Cross is picking up speedand gaining ground! She's flyingpast the competition!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Tamamo Cross takes the lead and...<n>That's it! With that
terrific dash,<n>Tamamo Cross rushes in to claim<n>first place!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Yeaaah! Now DAT'S what I'm talkin'<n>about! Dat was White
Lightning, aka...<n>TAMAMO CROSS!

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Hm? Her pacing was much steadier<n>this time around.
Maybe I misjudged<n>her...

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
That tremendous sprint at the end... I<n>thought her small
frame would hold<n>her back, but I guess not.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Yes, yes, YES! Didja see dat?! I blew<n>'em all away!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
Hell yeah! But you know, you're the<n>real star of the show.
Seriously, I<n>couldn't have done this without ya!
choice_data_list: Well, you're the one who ran the race.
Well, you're the one who ran the race.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Hehe!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
You know... with the tryouts done,<n>your trial period's
technically over.<n>You're free to scout and train<n>whoever
ya want.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: But... well, unless you've got a<n>certain racer in mind—

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
—I'd like to—OH, COME ON! I'm talkin'<n>here! I swear, ya
need a serious<n>lesson in manners. Seriously, lemme<n>finish
for once...

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Tone it down, will ya?!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: ...Pfft! Ahahaha! Baaaahahaha!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text:
For cryin' out loud, I feel so dumb. I<n>was so nervous, but
here ya are,<n>giddy as hell! I swear.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: But well, I'm glad you're on board!<n>Put 'er there, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I firmly grasp Tamamo Cross's hand<n>and give it a vigorous
shake. From<n>now on, we're working as a team!
